entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
